replies.bodyText:
Why change common.utils.JSONUtils to jackson.annotation.JsonFormat ?

A import auto refactoring happened here.

timeline.bodyText:
Hi,
Good job, but there is no necessary to add the FLOWNODE_RUN_FLAG_NORMAL in Constants just for test case.
If you want to add the constant, you can directly add FLOWNODE_RUN_FLAG_NORMAL in ConditionsTaskTest
timeline.author: yangyichao-mango

replies.bodyText: I just moved it to the test file by now, but I think it should be a constant for "NORMAL" in common/Constants.java for use in future.
replies.author: hsupu

timeline.bodyText:

Please add the test to root pom.
